body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Mary A. Vaughan. Father of James William Vaughan, Richard F. Vaughan, John H. Vaughan, and Sarah H. A. B. Vaughan. Farmer in Christian County in 1850 and 1860. Owned two enslaved people in Christian County in 1850. Owned eight enslaved people in Christian County in 1860.
